item.title: Lo, Tszwan
item.description: About me Welcome! My name is Lo TszWan (try to read it in Cantonese), call me Bob for convenience. This is my personal blog where I write articles about programming, algorithms, and thoughts on working projects. My focus mainly lies on: 3D Reconstrction Geometry Processing Computer Graphics C++/Swift Programming In general, I get a broad range of interests in algorithms and engineering related 3D, as I always believe that 3D techniques are beyond gaming, and immersive AR/VR devices will be the game changer in next gen human-computer interface.
